name: Blunderbuster (RedthePencilMonster)
description:
Play as Buster, a gun-slinging maniac who grabs random junk from a bottomless bag and fires it out of a blunderbuss with little regard for the consequences. How long can you survive?

Controls:

WASD to move

Left-click to shoot.

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. Theme: "Roll of the Dice." Naturally, randomness is at the very heart of this game

Music:

The Show Must Be Go Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
